title: Forex Today: Dollar attempts recovery after Fed, data blows, gold clings to $1,900, cryptos climb
content: Hi traders! On Monday we informed our users about a connectivity issue between our servers and those from our automation provider. As a result of that incident, there are still 5 open trades some of which could see delays in sending out the exit signals. The trades will be correctly closed at the indicated Stop Loss and Take Profit levels, but some of them require a manual intervention to send out the signal to the FXS Insights message feed.

title: FOMC April Minutes: The fist shoe drops
content: Today at 11:45 GMT, the European Central Bank (ECB) will release its Interest and Deposit Rate Decisions. Read the article written by FXS Senior Analyst Yohay Elam on the event: ECB Preview: Why June's decision presents a buy the dip opportunity

title: Premium Webinar: 'Elliott Wave Theory Live Trading' by Juan Maldonado
content: BTC/USD manages to break above the $36360 price level and rules out transit below $30,000 for the time being.
